channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Attaching patch. This is a collection of backported changes. Each change is individually available for inspection at https://github.com/apurtell/hbase/commits/HBASE-14870-0.98 . Look for the group of commits on Apr 1, 2016

Failed junit tests hadoop.hbase.replication.regionserver.TestReplicationThrottler

Hmm.. This passes when I run the tests here, complete successfully in 0.37 seconds. Let me resubmit the patch for another go around.
These are your changes Enis Soztutar, Ted Yu, and Matteo Bertozzi, do you see any issues with porting them back to the next 0.98 minor release? /cc Lars Hofhansl

These are your changes Enis Soztutar, Ted Yu, and Matteo Bertozzi, do you see any issues with porting them back to the next 0.98 minor release? /cc Lars Hofhansl

Skimmed the patch. Looks good.

Thanks for having a look Matteo Bertozzi and Enis Soztutar. I will commit this later today.

hadoop.hbase.replication.TestReplicationTrackerZKImpl
hadoop.hbase.master.TestAssignmentManager

Not seeing these failures local and I don't think they are related to this patch. Let me spend some separate time looking at flakes on 98 branch generally.
